verses.verse: אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תְּ֭קַנֵּא <S%H7065><s%> Be not thou envious בְּאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> men רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> against evil וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor [תִּתְאָו כ] (תִּ֝תְאָ֗יו <S%H183><s%> desire ק) לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become אִתָּֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁ֭ד <S%H7701><s%> destruction יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> studieth לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> For their heart וְ֝עָמָ֗ל <S%H5999><s%> of mischief שִׂפְתֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H8193><s%> and their lips תְּדַבֵּֽרְנָה׃ <S%H1696><s%> talk

בְּ֭חָכְמָה <S%H2451><s%> Through wisdom יִבָּ֣נֶה <S%H1129><s%> builded בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> is an house וּ֝בִתְבוּנָ֗ה <S%H8394><s%> and by understanding יִתְכּוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H3559><s%> it is established

וּ֭בְדַעַת <S%H1847><s%> And by knowledge חֲדָרִ֣ים <S%H2315><s%> shall the chambers יִמָּלְא֑וּ <S%H4390><s%> be filled כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ה֖וֹן <S%H1952><s%> riches יָקָ֣ר <S%H3368><s%> with all precious וְנָעִֽים׃ <S%H5273><s%> and pleasant

גֶּֽבֶר־ <S%H1397><s%> man חָכָ֥ם <S%H2450><s%> A wise בַּע֑וֹז <S%H5797><s%> [is] strong וְאִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> yea a man דַּ֝֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge מְאַמֶּץ־ <S%H553><s%> increaseth כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> strength

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> by בְ֭תַחְבֻּלוֹת <S%H8458><s%> For by wise counsel תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make לְּךָ֣ מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> thy war וּ֝תְשׁוּעָ֗ה <S%H8668><s%> [there is] safety בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> and in multitude יוֹעֵֽץ׃ <S%H3289><s%> of counsellors

רָאמ֣וֹת <S%H7311><s%> [is] too high לֶֽאֱוִ֣יל <S%H191><s%> for a fool חָכְמ֑וֹת <S%H2454><s%> Wisdom בַּ֝שַּׁ֗עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> he openeth פִּֽיהוּ׃ <S%H6310><s%> not his mouth
מְחַשֵּׁ֥ב <S%H2803><s%> He that deviseth לְהָרֵ֑עַ <S%H7489><s%> to do evil ל֝֗וֹ בַּֽעַל־ <S%H1167><s%> person מְזִמּ֥וֹת <S%H4209><s%> a mischievous יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> shall be called

זִמַּ֣ת <S%H2154><s%> The thought אִוֶּ֣לֶת <S%H200><s%> of foolishness חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> [is] sin וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] an abomination לְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> to men לֵֽץ׃ <S%H3887><s%> and the scorner
הִ֭תְרַפִּיתָ <S%H7503><s%> [If] thou faint בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> of adversity צַ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> [is] small כֹּחֶֽכָה׃ <S%H3581><s%> thy strength

הַ֭צֵּל <S%H5337><s%> to deliver לְקֻחִ֣ים <S%H3947><s%> [them that are] drawn לַמָּ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> unto death וּמָטִ֥ים <S%H4131><s%> and [those that are] ready לַ֝הֶ֗רֶג <S%H2027><s%> to be slain אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Oh תַּחְשֽׂוֹךְ׃ <S%H2820><s%> If thou forbear

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> If thou sayest הֵן֮ <S%H2005><s%> See לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֪עְנ֫וּ <S%H3045><s%> Behold we knew זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this הֲ‍ֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> who תֹ֘כֵ֤ן <S%H8505><s%> it not doth not he that pondereth לִבּ֨וֹת ׀ <S%H3826><s%> the heart הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יָבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> consider וְנֹצֵ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> [it]? and he that keepeth נַ֭פְשְׁךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> doth [not] he know וְהֵשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> [it]? and shall [not] he render לְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> to [every] man כְּפָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6467><s%> act

אֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> eat בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> My son דְבַ֣שׁ <S%H1706><s%> thou honey כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> because [it is] good וְנֹ֥פֶת <S%H5317><s%> and the honeycomb מָ֝ת֗וֹק <S%H4966><s%> [which is] sweet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto חִכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2441><s%> to thy taste

כֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> is thus דְּעֶ֥ה <S%H3045><s%> So [shall] the knowledge חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom לְנַ֫פְשֶׁ֥ךָ <S%H5315><s%> [be] unto thy soul אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מָ֭צָאתָ <S%H4672><s%> when thou hast found וְיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> [it] then there shall be אַחֲרִ֑ית <S%H319><s%> a reward וְ֝תִקְוָתְךָ֗ <S%H8615><s%> and thy expectation לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall not be cut off פ

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּאֱרֹ֣ב <S%H693><s%> Lay not wait רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> O wicked לִנְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> [man] against the dwelling צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּשַׁדֵּ֥ד <S%H7703><s%> spoil רִבְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H7258><s%> not his resting place

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֨בַע ׀ <S%H7651><s%> seven times יִפּ֣וֹל <S%H5307><s%> [man] falleth צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> For a just וָקָ֑ם <S%H6965><s%> and riseth up again וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> but the wicked יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ <S%H3782><s%> shall fall בְרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> into mischief

בִּנְפֹ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> falleth [אֹויְבֶיךָ כ] (אֹֽ֭ויִבְךָ <S%H341><s%> enemy ק) אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice וּ֝בִכָּשְׁל֗וֹ <S%H3782><s%> when he stumbleth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> be glad לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> and let not thine heart

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> see יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God וְרַ֣ע <S%H7489><s%> afflict בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> affliction וְהֵשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> him and he turn away מֵעָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> his wrath

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְחַ֥ר <S%H2734><s%> Fret בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> not thyself because of evil אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א <S%H7065><s%> [men] neither be thou envious בָּרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> at the wicked

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> there לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no תִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> For there shall be no reward לָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> to the evil נֵ֖ר <S%H5216><s%> [man] the candle רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <S%H1846><s%> shall be put out יְרָֽא־ <S%H3372><s%> affright אֶת־ <S%H853><s%>

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> thou the LORD בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> My son וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> are given שׁ֝וֹנִ֗ים <S%H8138><s%> not with them that are given to change אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְעָרָֽב׃ <S%H6148><s%> [and] meddle

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פִ֭תְאֹם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly יָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall rise אֵידָ֑ם <S%H343><s%> For their calamity וּפִ֥יד <S%H6365><s%> the ruin שְׁ֝נֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8147><s%> both מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and who יוֹדֵֽעַ׃ <S%H3045><s%> and who knoweth ס

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These לַֽחֲכָמִ֑ים <S%H2450><s%> These [things] also [belong] to the wise הַֽכֵּר־ <S%H5234><s%> to have respect פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> of persons בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> is not טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> [It is] not good

אֹ֤מֵ֨ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> He that saith לְרָשָׁע֮ <S%H7563><s%> unto the wicked צַדִּ֪יק <S%H6662><s%> Thou [art] righteous אָ֥תָּה <S%H859><s%> you יִקְּבֻ֥הוּ <S%H5344><s%> curse עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> him shall the people יִזְעָמ֥וּהוּ <S%H2194><s%> shall abhor לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> nations

וְלַמּוֹכִיחִ֥ים <S%H3198><s%> But to them that rebuke יִנְעָ֑ם <S%H5276><s%> [him] shall be delight וַֽ֝עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and תָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come בִרְכַּת־ <S%H1293><s%> blessing טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> and a good
שְׂפָתַ֥יִם <S%H8193><s%> [his] lips יִשָּׁ֑ק <S%H5401><s%> [Every man] shall kiss מֵ֝שִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> that giveth דְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> answer נְכֹחִֽים׃ <S%H5228><s%> a right

הָ֘כֵ֤ן <S%H3559><s%> Prepare בַּח֨וּץ ׀ <S%H2351><s%> without מְלַאכְתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H4399><s%> thy work וְעַתְּדָ֣הּ <S%H6257><s%> and make it fit בַּשָּׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> for thyself in the field לָ֑ךְ אַ֝חַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> and afterwards וּבָנִ֥יתָ <S%H1129><s%> build בֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> thine house פ

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> not be a עֵד־ <S%H5707><s%> Be not a witness חִנָּ֣ם <S%H2600><s%> without cause בְּרֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> against thy neighbour וַ֝הֲפִתִּ֗יתָ <S%H6601><s%> and deceive בִּשְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8193><s%> [not] with thy lips

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Say כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָֽשָׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> not I will do לִ֭י כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> so to him as he hath done לּ֑וֹ אָשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> to me I will render לָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man כְּפָעֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6467><s%> according to his work

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> by the field אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> of עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> the sluggard עָבַ֑רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> I went וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and by כֶּ֝֗רֶם <S%H3754><s%> and by the vineyard אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> of the man חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> void לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of understanding

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עָ֘לָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> And lo it was all grown over כֻלּ֨וֹ ׀ <S%H3605><s%> completely קִמְּשֹׂנִ֗ים <S%H2738><s%> [and] nettles כָּסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> had covered פָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> the face חֲרֻלִּ֑ים <S%H7063><s%> with thorns וְגֶ֖דֶר <S%H1444><s%> wall אֲבָנָ֣יו <S%H68><s%> thereof and the stone נֶהֱרָֽסָה׃ <S%H2040><s%> thereof was broken down

וָֽאֶחֱזֶ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> Then I saw אָ֭נֹכִֽי <S%H595><s%> I אָשִׁ֣ית <S%H7896><s%> apply לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> care for רָ֝אִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I looked לָקַ֥חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> upon [it and] received מוּסָֽר׃ <S%H4148><s%> instruction

מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> [Yet] a little שֵׁ֭נוֹת <S%H8142><s%> sleep מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> a little תְּנוּמ֑וֹת <S%H8572><s%> slumber מְעַ֓ט ׀ <S%H4592><s%> a little חִבֻּ֖ק <S%H2264><s%> folding יָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> of the hands לִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> to sleep

וּבָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> come מִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [as] one that travelleth רֵישֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7389><s%> So shall thy poverty וּ֝מַחְסֹרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4270><s%> and thy want כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מָגֵֽן׃ <S%H4043><s%> as an armed פ
